TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit RemoteConnection extends Java.Lang.Object

Docs.summary: A connection provided to a by another ConnectionService running in a different process.

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void Abort() cil managed

Docs.summary: Instructs this RemoteConnection to abort.

Docs.summary: Obtains the address of this RemoteConnection.
Docs.value: The address (e.g., phone number) to which the RemoteConnection is currently connected.

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

Docs.summary: Obtains the presentation requirements for the address of this RemoteConnection.
Docs.value: The presentation requirements for the address. See for valid values.

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

Docs.summary: Obtains the display name for this RemoteConnection's caller.

Docs.summary: Obtains the presentation requirements for this RemoteConnection's caller's display name.

Docs.summary: Obtain the RemoteConference that this RemoteConnection may be a part of, or null if there is no such RemoteConference.

Docs.summary: Obtain the RemoteConnections with which this RemoteConnection may be successfully asked to create a conference with.
Docs.value: The RemoteConnections with which this RemoteConnection may be merged into a .

Docs.summary: Obtains the capabilities of this RemoteConnection.
Docs.value: A bitmask of the capabilities of the RemoteConnection, as defined in the CAPABILITY_* constants in class .

Docs.summary: Obtains the properties of this RemoteConnection.
Docs.value: A bitmask of the properties of the RemoteConnection, as defined in the PROPERTY_* constants in class .

Docs.summary: Obtains the reason why this RemoteConnection may have been disconnected.

Docs.summary: Determines whether this RemoteConnection is requesting ringback.

Docs.summary: Determines if the audio mode of this RemoteConnection is VOIP.
Docs.value: true if the RemoteConnection's current audio mode is VOIP.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void PlayDtmfTone(char digit) cil managed

Docs.param: A character representing the DTMF digit for which to play the tone. This value must be one of '0' through '9', '*' or '#'.
Docs.summary: Instructs this RemoteConnection to play a dual-tone multi-frequency signaling (DTMF) tone.

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void PostDialContinue(bool proceed) cil managed

Docs.param: Whether or not to continue with the post-dial sequence.
Docs.summary: Instructs this RemoteConnection to continue playing a post-dial DTMF string.

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.
